valr
  • Overview
  • Reference
  • News

Compare two tbl_dfs and find the minimum shared groups

shared_groups returns the minimum shared groups between x and y tbls. Return value is NULL if there are no shared groups.

shared_groups(x, y)

Arguments

x
tbl
y
tbl

Value

list

Examples

x <- tibble::tribble(
 ~chrom, ~start, ~end, ~value,
  "chr1", 150,    400,  100,
  "chr2", 230,    430,  200
  )

y <- tibble::tribble(
  ~chrom,   ~start,    ~end,  ~value,
  "chr1",    50,       100,  1,
  "chr1",    100,       150,  2
  )

x <- dplyr::group_by(x, chrom, value)
y <- dplyr::group_by(y, chrom, value)
shared_groups(x, y)
#> [[1]]
#> chrom
#> 
#> [[2]]
#> value
#> 
#> 

y <- dplyr::group_by(y, chrom)
shared_groups(x, y)
#> [[1]]
#> chrom
#> 
#> 

y <-dplyr::ungroup(y)
shared_groups(x, y)
#> NULL
#>
